extension.description: Aspose PDF Importer Module for Joomla allows developers to get/read contents of PDF document without requiring any other software such as Adobe Acrobat or PDF reader. This module demonstrates the powerful import feature provided by Aspose.Pdf . It adds a simple button above Editor in Article section and asks for the PDF file to be imported into the editor. Once the Pdf file is provided, users get the document contents displayed on the editor immediately.
